name: Deathchill
description:
Your Remorseless Winter and Chains of Ice apply Deathchill, rooting the target in place for 4 sec.

Remorseless Winter 
All targets within 8 yards are afflicted with Deathchill when Remorseless Winter is cast.

Chains of Ice
When you Chains of Ice a target already afflicted by your Chains of Ice they will be afflicted by Deathchill.
